title: U.S. tariffs on China won't change again, Lutnick says after trade talks
subhead: Howard Lutnick said China was slow-walking key measures and the U.S. was retaliating in kind, until President Donald Trump got on the phone with Xi Jinping.

title: U.S. budget deficit hit $316 billion in May, with annual shortfall up 14% from a year ago
subhead: The U.S. government drifted further into red ink during May, with a burgeoning debt and deficit issue getting worse.

title: JPMorgan's Jamie Dimon warns U.S. economy could soon 'deteriorate'
subhead: "Employment will come down a little bit. Inflation will go up a little bit. Hopefully, it's just a little bit," Dimon said.

title: Here's the inflation breakdown for May 2025 — in one chart
subhead: Inflation was tame in May but President Trump's tariff policy may cause consumer prices to rise noticeably heading into summer, economists said.

title: Stargate partner Crusoe lands $750 million credit line for AI buildout
subhead: Crusoe, a key player in the $500 billion Stargate project, is raising debt to help fund its buildout.
